short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using the Arzeshiyab Chrome Extension, you can identify vilounace and threatening user accounts on mainstream social networks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension allows users to highlight or hide tweets from violent accounts that support the Islamic regime in Iran. By using this extension, users can easily identify or filter out content that promotes violence or supports a regime that has a history of human rights abuses. 

The extension works using Arzeshiyab's API that provides a pre-processed list of pro-regime accounts which is curated by analyzing the activity of suspicious twitter accounts and identifying those that express support for the Islamic regime in Iran and advocate their ideologies. Users can customize the extension to either highlight or hide these tweets, depending on their personal preferences.
